title: Winter Resource Fair
description: Connect with over 50 local service providers offering free resources, health screenings, and assistance applications. Free food, activities for kids, and door prizes!

title: Financial Literacy Workshop
description: Learn budgeting basics, credit building strategies, and how to access financial assistance programs.

title: Job Seekers Networking
description: Meet local employers, practice interview skills, and learn about job training opportunities.

title: Parenting Support Group
description: Connect with other parents, share experiences, and learn positive parenting strategies.

title: Healthcare Navigation
description: Get help understanding insurance options, finding affordable care, and applying for assistance.

title: Senior Tech Training
description: Learn to use smartphones, tablets, and computers for staying connected and accessing services.

title: Mental Health First Aid
description: Free certification training to help you recognize and respond to mental health challenges.
